thread.section_title: Packlane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Packlane | packlane.com
thread.title: Jenny Locanthi

author: Jenny Locanthi
title: Jenny Locanthi
text:
We started shipping gifts to our new hires to help us make a great first impression and welcome them to our Bank. With so many decorative boxes being used these days I thought it was be awesome if we could do the same!
The design process was wonderfully easy - I simply typed in the dimensions I wanted & then uploaded/created the text & imagery for each face of the box. We went back and forth with support a few times but this was just to ensure that the print quality of our images was high enough for the size of our project - the correspondence was always very prompt and friendly!
Our custom box turned out amazingly well and I can't wait to use it for our next new hire welcome package! Thank you, Packlane!
Jenny, Director of HR
